Hi Guys, 

Lucy, how are those renders coming along please? 

Ben or Lucy, I'm going to need the logins to your Stripe account to setup the payments. I can't get them from the old site as they are encrypted.

Hi Heath,

We have a render which Lucy will reply with but use the attached for now. Crop and PhotoShop into these as you like to try and sexy them up! We are under real pressure to get this up and live as Michigan is shut down as of tomorrow night and all these units are being cut and made overnight to go into a house basement to keep the business going as no one is allowed out after tomorrow night.

The other point I missed was that these are only being offered in the color Platinum.

Reminder that this is for the US site and we will launch AU's later next week.

Warm regards,

Ben Grace
Managing Director - Global
t +61 1800.62.64.62 m +61 407.075.840Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Noted, thanks Ben. 

Do you have any photos as yet?

Hi Heath,

We have some operational constraints and have had to change course slight to only offer a U and L shape divider. So drop the T and H.

Hi Ben, 

Thanks for sending this through. I'm going to push to get it done by COB tomorrow. 

Assuming we are going to sell these online, are you able to supply pricing information or do you want us to simply and interim enquire now style form?

I'll reach out if we have any other questions.

Hi Heath,

I had a good chat with Lucy on the web side of things and I will think about how we take the plan forward overnight tonight as we all agree that some changes need to be made.

I would like to give this whole task to you in the best ability I can to test this approach following our conversation.

We need the Mobile Acoustics product strategy live by this Saturday.

Here is the Loom recording instructing where the main pieces need to go -https://www.loom.com/share/f79fd6229b4a461c8c896efdd45fe6d4 <https://www.loom.com/share/f79fd6229b4a461c8c896efdd45fe6d4>

Under the Wall category
Mobile Acoustics is the product category
Table Solutions is the Product
T Divider, H Divider and L Divider are the designs
Offered in all solid colors

Narrative for Table Solutions product page

Brief for top of page

Fast, Flexible and Functional. Acoustic solutions for remote and flexible working.
Hear and be heard, wherever you work. Stay sound at home.
Wherever you are working, we want you to be comfortable carrying out business as usual.


Brief for lower part of page

In response to the world’s increasing demand for flexible and remote workspaces, Acoufelt have created a line of acoustic home furniture solutions; Fast, Flexible and Functional.

Fast
We’ve made this range quick and easy to assemble and install, so you can focus your time on what’s important.

Flexible
These solutions are mobile, so you can set up your workspace wherever you need to.

Functional
Our solutions are designed for acoustics, so you can stay sound at work. Undistracted by the noise of the outside world.

There’s a lot of noise in the world right now. We all need space to work. We all need a quiet space to work. Wherever you are working, we want you to be comfortable carrying out business as usual. We want you to be able to create a pleasant working environment, to be productive, creative, and communicate with others effectively. As we explore new methods for human connection, we want to make sure that you can hear and be heard clearly across a range of communication platforms. Free from the noise and echo of the outside world.

Make your space your own. Communicate to hear and be heard. Stay sound wherever you work.

Our working world is a noisy place. As we adapt to the changing face of working spaces, we seek spaces to work in that allow us to concentrate, take and make calls without background interruptions or distractions.

Landing page

I have attached the layout for this and all photos are to be dummy images for now as the US will supply overnight tonight.


Warm regards,

Ben Grace
Managing Director - Global
